How the ukranian conflict affects the defense industry ?

Learn more about how the Ukranian conflicts affect the defense industry.

Blog post by Adrien Dumont - Published at 07/03/2022, 23:30:46

How the Ukranian conflict is affecting the defense industry ?

.

Thales share price evolution over the last month

.

With the start of the conflict between Ukraine and Russia, the arms companies shares prices are going crazy.
.

The fear that the conflict could expend to middle Europe, has conducted investors to put their money on the defense industry.

.

For example, the english company baesystems has seen his share price increased by 27,3% over the last month.


.

Same thing for the french compagny Thales which share price went up by 42,4% over the last month.
